author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-3889: LOBStreamControl.truncate() doesn't delete temporary files
Created helper method for closing and deleting temporary files to make
it less likely that some of the required operations are
forgotten. Also moved the lobFile field into the LOBFile class to
reduce the risk of getting inconsistencies between the fields tmpFile

msg: CAMEL-463: Adding support for setting a header from a route

author: vhennebert
msg: Bugzilla #45971: improved the behaviour of the command line interface:
- display 'fop' instead of 'Fop' in help messages
- do not throw exception when running fop without argument or with -v or -h
Patch submitted with some modifications by Tom Browder (tom_dot.browder.at_gmail.dot_com)
